title: VD? See your doctor
creator_credit: Karl Konnery, James McCormick and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: A straightforward presentation of the cause, symptoms and danger of venereal disease, with strong emphasis on the need to obtain early medical treatment. Although venereal disease, syphilis and gonorrhea, should be extinct in this scientific age, there is an alarming increase in their incidence.
